entity.name: Big Brother Brasil
entity.description:
Acompanhe as novidades da 20ª edição do BBB, confira as reações do pessoal ao programa de hoje e fique por dentro das movimentações e estratégias rolando dentro desta 'nave louca'. Será que seu brother/sister preferido irá vencer o prêmio de R$ 1,5 milhão? 

Foto via @BBB

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @toryboypierce @cathcartboy @COVID19 @MattHancock Sounded to me as though they moved the goalposts re what the “target” is/was. I’m no fan of cynical prior agendas & finding fault for its own sake, but political rhetorical sleight-of-hand isn’t good either, doesn’t help build trust & it’s the job of a free press to call it out.
